statement.p: A bookshelf containing 7 bookshelves is to be constructed. The floor-to-ceiling clearance is 7 ft 3.0 in. Each shelf is 1.0 in thick. An equal space is to be left between the shelves, the top shelf and the ceiling, and the bottom shelf and the floor. (There is no shelf on the ceiling or floor.)
What space should be between each shelf and the next? Round your answer to the nearest tenth of an inch.
